# Setting Up Online Booking For A Squarespace Website

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/setting-up-online-booking-for-a-squarespace-website/

## Category
13 Online Booking

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
ONLINE BOOKING
ONLINE BOOKING SETUP GUIDES
Adding Online Booking to a Squarespace Website

This article covers how to integrate online booking with your Squarespace website.

The Mangomint team is available to set up your online booking integration for you for free. Please contact us and we'll complete the integration for you.

If you would like to complete the integration yourself, follow the steps in this article. If you need help or have any questions, please reach out to chat support.

Link copied
Integrating online booking with your Squarespace website

To integrate online booking with your Squarespace website, open the Settings app and select Online Booking > Setup & Integration.

Copy your script tag.

In Squarespace, go to Pages > Website Tools > Code Injection.

Paste the script tag in the header section.

In Mangomint, copy your online booking link.

Use the link as the URL for any booking buttons/links on your website to complete the integration. Make sure you disable the Open in New Window toggle.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
